ability.name: Burning Hunger
ability.effect: Attach discarded cards to Magcargo instead. You may only move cards from Magcargo via Inferno. Pokemon are Basic Energies of their type. Trainers are Colorless.

attacks.name: Inferno
attacks.effect: You may move up to 10 cards attached to Magcargo to the Lost Zone. This attack deals 10 more damage for every 2 cards moved this way.
